segments.text: I'm looking into this kitchen, and it's quite a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink seems completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But what I immediately notice is the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing the sink basin in a steady, continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down the cabinet doors and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is forming right where she's standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's actually got one foot in the water already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing that she hasn't reacted at all to the cold water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her face remains perfectly calm, focused only on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll slip and fall on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a disaster waiting to happen right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess will be considerable when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR
